name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Platform Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing robust applications across healthcare and financial sectors. Expert in **Python**, with additional proficiency in **GoLang** for building scalable solutions. Demonstrates hands-on experience in **AWS** and **Azure** cloud services, enhancing system performance and reliability. Skilled in deploying **CI/CD** pipelines and utilizing **Git** for version control within **Agile** environments. Exceptional knowledge of **RESTful API** design and integration, ensuring seamless communication between services.

Proficient in supporting AI initiatives through machine learning and predictive analytics. Strong multitasking capabilities with an impressive track record in leading compliance-driven development adhering to standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS. Adept at managing system operations within **Linux** environments, incorporating elements of **networking** to optimize platform functionality.
